articlesummaries-show-summary-text: Label for the button that opens the article summary dialog
articlesummaries-show-summary-small:
Text showing when the summary was generated. Parameters:
* $1 - The date when the summary was generated
articlesummaries-summary-overlay-footer-: Header text for the footer section explaining how the summary was created
articlesummaries-summary-overlay-notice: Label indicating that this is a machine-generated summary
articlesummaries-summary-overlay-warning: Warning label indicating the summary is unverified
articlesummaries-summary-overlay-footer-: Detailed explanation of how the summary was generated and its experimental nature
Question asking users if the summary was helpful
Label for the positive feedback button
Label for the negative feedback button
